name: Uncover the Smoking Gun
summary:
Welcome to an exciting detective game, rooted in a future where humans and robots coexist. Become a specialist detective in this vibrant world, diving deep into rich investigations:
Free-form conversation feature facilitates deeply immersive, real-time dialogues with NPCs, allowing for the thrilling uncovering of hidden secrets.
Venture into crime scenes filled with intricate clues and evidence, unraveling truths lurking beneath.
Interrogate suspicious characters, weighing their words against the evidence you've collected.
Key features involve intense evidence collection, interactive unlocking challenges, and critical results submission.
You'll need sharp investigative skills and the knack for connecting seemingly unrelated evidence to successfully crack the cases.
Prepare for an immersive gaming experience steeped in mystery and adventure, awaiting your exploration on itch.io.
